Class ChatRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • yt30_lp28.chatapp.impl.ChatRoom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChatRoom, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServerChatRoom

    public class ChatRoom
extends java.lang.Object
implements IChatRoom
    ChatRoom defines a set of operations of a chat room, implement interface IChatRoom

      • sendPacket

        public <T extends ICRMessageType> void sendPacket(DataPacketCR<T> data)
        Description copied from interface: IChatRoom
        Send a data packet to everyone in the chat room asynchronously. This method should send the data packet asynchronously, i.e. delegates the sending process into a new thread. The possible status will be returned in an asynchronous way, which will be processed by the receiver.
        Specified by:
        sendPacket in interface IChatRoom
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the data being held.
        Parameters:
        data - The data packet to be sent

      • addIReceiverStub

        public boolean addIReceiverStub(IReceiver receiver)
        Description copied from interface: IChatRoom
        Add a receiver in the local chat room without interacting with remote peers
        Specified by:
        addIReceiverStub in interface IChatRoom
        Parameters:
        receiver - the receiver to add
        Returns:
        False if the receiver is already in the chat room; True if successfully add the receiver

      • removeIReceiverStub

        public boolean removeIReceiverStub(IReceiver receiver)
        Description copied from interface: IChatRoom
        Remove a receiver in the local chat room without interacting with remote peers
        Specified by:
        removeIReceiverStub in interface IChatRoom
        Parameters:
        receiver - the receiver to remove
        Returns:
